text: @YUVSTRONG12 @SAfridiOfficial @SAFoundationN @harbhajan_singh When he says "Lets do our bit, I am supporting @SAfridiOfficial & @SAFoundationN in this noble initiative of covid19" it can only mean his support to those who spread Covid19. Tabligh Jamaat, which has let loose its biowar foot soldiers in India, has Afridi as a follower. https://t.co/C2ysh4ACx7
